verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He’s alive, He’s alive, He’s alive forevermore Jesus has risen from the dead. He’s alive, He’s alive, He’s alive forevermore Now He has become our living head.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He’s alive, He’s alive, He’s alive forevermore Jesus has risen from the dead. He’s alive, He’s alive, He’s alive forevermore Now He has become our living head.{/lang-eng}
